text:
Aww yeah everyone! Today we are learning 
English with one of the funniest stories

from Friends and trust me you will be laughing 
out loud by the end! Now, today's lesson is

extra special. I'm really excited. Do you want 
to know why? Because today I get to introduce

you to your newest fluency coach Ollie! He 
is going to be helping me to teach the lesson

so help me give a warm welcome to Ollie! Oh yeah! 
Thanks Ethan, what's up everybody? I'm Ollie your

new RealLife English fluency coach. I'm from 
Australia but i've been living in South America

for the past two years. I'm really excited to 
help you go beyond the classroom, to understand

fast speaking natives, and to bring a 
little bit of Australian culture too!

All right, so now let's start the lesson but 
quickly for those of you that are new here,

every week we help you to 
understand fast speaking natives:

without getting lost, without missing the jokes 
and without subtitles! Just like Harnoor who

says that our lessons help her to boost her 
confidence speaking English, we're going to

help you to reach your English learning goals too! 
Just hit that subscribe button and the bell below

and you won't miss any of our new lessons. So, are 
you ready to learn to Unagi with Ross? Let's go!

Before we analyze the vocabulary in this 
clip we're going to look at three sentences

where they use interesting 
features of connected speech.

If you want to learn more about 
connected speech then you should

check out this video we made over on 
our RealLife English youtube channel!

To watch it next just click up here 
or down in the description below!

Do you love Friends but find it difficult to 
understand fast speaking natives? Then I recommend

you try our free three-part master class! In this 
masterclass you are going to learn pronunciation,

vocabulary and cultural context, which are three 
important skills when trying to understand your

favorite TV series. To try it today, simply 
click up here or down in the description below!

Hey again and thanks for joining me and 
Ollie today! I hope you've had a ton of fun

and laughed a lot. Ollie, Andrea and I and 
the rest of the RealLife team are committed

to bringing you better and better lessons to 
help you to go beyond the classroom and take

your English fluency to the next level! We look 
forward to seeing you soon for another fun lesson,

so if you have not already make 
sure you don't miss a single one

by hitting the subscribe button 
and the bell down below! Aww yeah!
